tests.title: As a Admin the user should be navigated to the Unverified payments page by clicking on the "Unverified Payments" button on the Appointment page
tests.fullTitle: unverified payment testcases As a Admin the user should be navigated to the Unverified payments page by clicking on the "Unverified Payments" button on the Appointment page

tests.title: At "Unverified Payments" page each label and field should have proper label and validations
tests.fullTitle: unverified payment testcases At "Unverified Payments" page each label and field should have proper label and validations

tests.title: As a Admin the user can search any unverified appointment By Appointment id,patient name or provider name
tests.fullTitle: unverified payment testcases As a Admin the user can search any unverified appointment By Appointment id,patient name or provider name

tests.title: As a Admin the user can filter the unverified appointments by using the filter on the top right corner of the list  by the payment mode cash or pos etc.
tests.fullTitle: unverified payment testcases As a Admin the user can filter the unverified appointments by using the filter on the top right corner of the list  by the payment mode cash or pos etc.

tests.title: As a Admin the user can filter the  unverified payments list in Ascending or descending of appointment requested date by clicking on the filter on "Appointment date" field of the table.
tests.fullTitle: unverified payment testcases As a Admin the user can filter the  unverified payments list in Ascending or descending of appointment requested date by clicking on the filter on "Appointment date" field of the table.

tests.title: As a Admin the user should be navigated to the "Appointment details" page by clicking on eye icon against that particular Unverified request.
tests.fullTitle: unverified payment testcases As a Admin the user should be navigated to the "Appointment details" page by clicking on eye icon against that particular Unverified request.

tests.title: As a Admin the user can verify payment of any appointment by clicking on the verify button against that appointment and user will get verification confirmation window
tests.fullTitle: unverified payment testcases As a Admin the user can verify payment of any appointment by clicking on the verify button against that appointment and user will get verification confirmation window

tests.title: By clicking on the "Verify" button a confirmation modal will open.
tests.fullTitle: unverified payment testcases By clicking on the "Verify" button a confirmation modal will open.

tests.title: As a Admin the user can click on the verify button on the confirmation to verify the payment
tests.fullTitle: unverified payment testcases As a Admin the user can click on the verify button on the confirmation to verify the payment
